document_data.name: Hurda Marganir
document_data.mainbody: '''Hurda Marganir''' was a [[human]] businesswoman in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: Hurda was a heavyset woman with shoulder-length gray hair. She wore a white and gray dress and a [[choker (necklace)|choker]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Hurda accompanied the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] to their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|forward camp]] near the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. She set up a fancy [[tent]] with numerous secure chests, and offered her storage services to those who passed through the camp.
